revised_title: Investigations on Sodium Vapour Resonance Radiation and its Interaction with Magnetic Fields
tldr: The author investigates the behavior of sodium vapour resonance radiation under different conditions, including fluorescence and resonance radiation experiments, and the effect of magnetic fields on the radiation. The results show that resonance radiation behaves differently under electrical and fluorescent excitation, and that the intensity of resonance radiation decreases with increasing magnetic field strength.
